sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT GROUP_ID,OBJECT_ID,OBJECT_NAME,SRC_CONNECTION_ID,SRC_CONNECTION_TYPE_ID,SRC_SCHEMA,SRC_TABLE,SRC_COLUMNS,SRC_EXTRACT_TYPE,SRC_INCREMENTAL_COLUMN,SRC_INCREMENTAL_VALUE,TGT_INCREMENTAL_COLUMN,TGT_CONNECTION_ID,TGT_SCHEMA_NAME,TGT_TABLE_NAME,MAPPING_EXPRESSION,TGT_LOAD_OPTION,TGT_PRIMARY_KEY,s.CONNECTION_ID as RDBMS_CONNECTION_ID, s.DB_NAME AS SRC_DATABASE_NAME, s.SYSTEM_ID as SID, s.HOST_NAME as SRC_HOST_NAME, s.USERNAME as SRC_RDBMS_USERNAME, s.PASSWORD as SRC_RDBMS_PASSWORD,t.DB_NAME as SQL_DB_NAME,t.SYSTEM_ID as SQL_SCHEMA,t.HOST_NAME  as SQL_HOST_NAME,t.PORT_NUMBER as SQL_PORT_NUMBER,t.USERNAME as SQL_USERNAME,t.PASSWORD as SQL_PASSWORD FROM dbo.RDBMS_INGESTION_DETAILS r left join dbo.RDBMS_CONNECTION_DETAILS s on r.SRC_CONNECTION_ID = s.CONNECTION_ID left join dbo.RDBMS_CONNECTION_DETAILS t on r.TGT_CONNECTION_ID = s.CONNECTION_ID where group_id=@{pipeline().parameters.groupID}

activities.name: If Condition For Full or INCR Load
